entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WARNING , Greenstone (Beardmore)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:59 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -13.2°C

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 14.
entry.summary: Flurries. Blowing snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 increasing to 50 gusting to 80 this afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 14. Wind chill near minus 26. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local blowing snow. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 12. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
